title: Placeholder
description: This is a short placeholder paragraph to simulate what actual project content may look like. As of now there is no limit to the amount of characters that can be in a project description, which may no be a bad thing because we want the project owners to have the room to be as descriptive as possible.

title: A simple css fix
description: My client has decided they want the background color of the buttons to change across the board. All you have to do is find the css declaration for btn-main and change the color to #f4f4f4.

title: Add password reset module
description: Site currently doesn't have way for users to reset passwords for their account. For now, I need someone to build a form that sends me an email with their account name, old password, and new password and I'll manually change it in the database.
